panels.description: Shows the current build version of the SUI Bridge Node.
panels.title: Build Version

panels.description: Displays the chain identifier of the SUI Chain.
panels.title: SUI Chain ID

panels.description: Displays the chain identifier of the Ethereum Chain.
panels.title: ETH Chain ID

panels.description: Shows the current voting power distribution within the bridge committee, offering insights into the committee's decision-making influence and individual authority contributions.
panels.title: Voting Power

panels.description: Indicates whether the SUI Bridge client is enabled, showing 'true' or 'false' based on its current status.
panels.title: Client Enabled

panels.description: Displays the total uptime of the SUI Bridge Node, indicating its operational status.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Displays the uptime trend status of the SUI Bridge Node. Green indicates uptime is increasing, and red indicates it is not.
panels.title: Uptime Timeline

panels.description: Displays the pause status for both ETH and SUI bridges.
panels.title: Bridge Pause Status

panels.description: Displays the current balance of the Ethereum vault for the SUI Bridge node. The balance is shown in ETH units, with regular updates reflecting the latest state.
panels.title: ETH Vault Balance

panels.description: Displays the current balance of the USDT vault for the SUI Bridge node. The balance is shown in USDT units, with regular updates reflecting the latest state.
panels.title: USDT Vault Balance

panels.description: Displays the current balance of the gas coin for the SUI Bridge node. The balance is shown in SUI units, with regular updates reflecting the latest state.
panels.title: SUI Gas Coin Balance

panels.description: Shows the timeline of the SUI Gas Balance for the SUI Bridge Node.
panels.title: ETH Vault Balance Over Time

panels.description: Shows the timeline of the SUI Gas Balance for the SUI Bridge Node.
panels.title: USDT Vault Balance Over Time

panels.description: Shows the timeline of the SUI Gas Balance for the SUI Bridge Node.
panels.title: SUI Gas Coin Balance Over Time

panels.description: Provides an overview of key metrics for bridge event processing, including received, successful, and unrecognized events for both ETH and SUI networks. This panel offers insights into event volume, anomalies, and potential processing issues across different blockchain integrations.
panels.title: Events Overview

panels.description: Displays the rate of received events in the Sui Watcher over time, providing insights into event processing throughput and anomaly detection.
panels.title: Events Rate Over Time

panels.description: Displays the rate of unrecognized events in the Sui Watcher over time, providing insights into event processing throughput and anomaly detection.
panels.title: Unrecognized Events Rate Over Time

panels.description: Provides an aggregated overview of bridge requests, including total received, successfully processed (OK), and error requests. Data is categorized by request type, offering insights into system throughput and reliability.
panels.title: Requests Overview

panels.description: Displays the number of inflight requests over time, categorized by request type, providing visibility into ongoing operations and potential bottlenecks in request handling.
panels.title: Inflight Requests Over Time

panels.description: Displays the rate of received requests over time, categorized by request type, providing visibility into ongoing operations and potential bottlenecks in request handling.
panels.title: Received Requests Rate Over Time

panels.description: Displays the rate of error requests over time, categorized by request type.
panels.title: Error Requests Rate Over Time

panels.description: This panel provides an aggregated overview of bridge actions, including the total number of received, successfully processed (OK), and error requests. The data is categorized by request type, offering valuable insights into the system's throughput and reliability. It helps monitor the performance of different bridge action components, such as SUI -> ETH and ETH -> SUI data flows, allowing you to track received, processed, and skipped actions efficiently.
panels.title: Actions Overview

panels.description: Shows key metrics for the Bridge Action Executor queue, including totals for received, skipped, and already processed actions, helping monitor queue performance and efficiency.
panels.title: Action Executor Signing Queue Actions

panels.description: Displays metrics for the execution queue in the Bridge Action Executor, including totals for received actions and actions skipped due to pausing, providing insights into queue activity and processing behavior.
panels.title: Action Executor Execution Queue Actions

panels.description: Displays error metrics for the Bridge Action Executor, including failures during Sui transaction execution, submission errors, and continuous submission failures, helping identify and address recurring issues.

targets.legendFormat: submit sui tx too many failure {{host}}

panels.title: Action Executor Errors

panels.description: Displays the number of inflight items across monitored channels and the count of running tasks per callsite, providing visibility into system activity and task processing states.
panels.title: Channel Inflight Items

panels.description: Displays the rate of Ethereum RPC queries processed over time, providing insights into query frequency and system workload trends.
panels.title: ETH RPC Query Rate Over Time

panels.description: Displays the latency distribution for Ethereum RPC queries, categorized by method name.
panels.title: ETH RPC Query Latency Distribution

panels.description: Displays the latency distribution for spans in the bridge node service, categorized by span names. Latency is measured in milliseconds and displayed across the 50th, 95th, and 99th percentiles.
panels.title: Tracing Span Latency Distribution

panels.description: Displays the average latency for spans in the bridge node service.
panels.title: Tracing Span Average Latency

list.description: This variable dynamically fetches and displays all available SUI Node Bridge targets based on the instance label from your Prometheus metrics.
list.label: Bridge Node Target
list.name: instance
